item.title: Microsoft 365 Ultimate Guide
item.dc:creator: Pandit
item.description: Have you always wanted to learn Microsoft 365 but don’t know where to start? Would you like to
item.content:encoded:
Have you always wanted to learn Microsoft 365 but don’t know where to start?

Would you like to manager accounts and bring your ideas to life?

Then Microsoft 365 2021 Ultimate Course is for you!

Microsoft 365 is an in-demand skill in 2021.

The course begins with the basics.

I’ll take you through everything you need to know to start adding accounts like an expert with Microsoft 365.

You’ll learn all the fundamentals of Microsoft 365.

This is great for students starting or for IT Personal that need a refresher course on Microsoft 365.

There are no requirements necessary to enroll I only ask that you come open minded and ready to learn

Feel Free to look through the course description and checkout some of my preview videos

The course is packed with over 22 hours of hands-on tutorials

What you’ll learn

  • Setup Microsoft 365 Account
  • Learn Microsoft 365
  • Learn Microsoft 365 Menu and Interface
  • Home
  • Users
  • Groups
  • Billing
  • Setup
  • Reports
  • Health
  • Security
  • Compliance
  • Azure Active Directory
  • Dark Mode
  • User Management

Are there any course requirements or prerequisites?

  • Willingness to Have Fun and Learn!
  • Setup Microsoft 365 Account
  • Have Access to Microsoft 365 Account

Who this course is for:

  • Beginner to Advanced Students wanting to Learn Microsoft 365

So what are you waiting for? I look forward to going through course with you I’ll see you inside!
